home.title: English Proficiency Test
home.subtitle: Test your English skills with our comprehensive assessment featuring reading comprehension, grammar, and vocabulary exercises.

reading.title: Reading Comprehension
reading.description: Test your understanding of written English texts

grammar.title: Grammar & Vocabulary
grammar.description: Assess your knowledge of English grammar rules

cloze.title: Cloze Tests
cloze.description: Fill in the blanks to complete passages

home.testInfo: The test contains multiple question types and takes approximately 30-45 minutes to complete.

pauseModal.title: Pause Test
pauseModal.message: Are you sure you want to pause the test?
pauseModal.warning: Once paused, you must wait 30 minutes before you can resume the test. This restriction prevents abuse of the pause feature.

newTestModal.title: Start New Test
newTestModal.message: Are you sure you want to start a completely new test?
newTestModal.warning: This will permanently delete all your current progress and answers. You will start with fresh questions and a new 60-minute timer.

noTestAvailable.title: No Test Available
noTestAvailable.message: No published question groups were found to create a test.
